levels.layout_description: The ground floor features an open plan living-dining area that transitions into a modern kitchen and central courtyard. Bedrooms are arranged around the perimeter to maximize privacy while still benefiting from abundant natural light and ventilation via individual balconies. The design emphasizes Vastu principles by positioning key rooms along the east-west axis for optimal energy flow, and includes sustainable features like energy-efficient windows, eco-friendly appliances, and a natural swimming pool system.
